speaker: Dizzy
text: First mission~ First mission~ The Nova Brigade is here to kick enemy butt!

speaker: Terra
text: I thought an interdimensional train car would look a little more... impressive.

speaker: Ashe
text: This should be a piece of cake.

speaker: Dizzy
text: OOOH! Look! There's a cute little critter over there!!

speaker: Terra
text: This appears to be a [name] from [system]. Theyre typically very docile.

speaker: Dizzy
text: Aww.. what a cute little guy. Are you lost? Come here~ it’ll be okay! pspspsps

speaker: Ashe
text: I get the feeling that thing isn’t lost. We should be careful.

speaker: Dizzy
text: It cant be *that* bad right? Nice doggie. *petpet*

speaker: Terra
text: Interesting... this one seems much more aggressive than what I’ve read online.
